# cornerStyle

**Instance Property**

The button style that controls the display behavior of the background corner radius.

## Declaration

```swift
var cornerStyle: UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property controls the behavior of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBackgroundConfiguration-swift.struct/cornerRadius] you set on the configuration background. The default corner style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/Configuration-swift.struct/CornerStyle-swift.enum/dynamic].

## Configuring the button background

- **background**: The configuration to customize the button background.
- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle**: Settings that determine the appearance of the background corner radius.
